mapper.select: select m.company_code, m.permission_kbn, m.menu_number, ms.menu_button_name, ms.menu_disp_url,m. available_flg, ms.button_color, ms.button_color, ms.font_color, ms.font_color, ms.font_size, ms.menu_icon, m.option_value1, m.option_value2, m.option_value3, m.option_value4, m.option_value5, m.option_value6, m.option_value1_exp, m.option_value2_exp, m.option_value3_exp, m.option_value4_exp, m.option_value5_exp, m.option_value6_exp from m_menu m left join m_menu_style ms on m.company_code = ms.company_code and m.menu_number = ms.menu_number where m.company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=CHAR} and m.permission_kbn = #{permissionKbn,jdbcType=CHAR}
